Videntes MultiSpectral Imaging Collective

Videntes is a multispectral and experimental imaging collective focused on medieval manuscripts in a modern world.

Videntes MultiSpectral Imaging Collective, 2021 - 2025. DigitalArc Jekyll Theme by Kalani Craig is licensed under CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 Framework: Foundation 6.
